short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun and addictive clicking game where you collect as many piggies as possible! How wealthy can you become with these piggies?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Piggy Payday - Click and Gamble for Piggy Riches!

Do you love cute pigs and thrilling action? Then Piggy Payday is the perfect game for you! This addictive clicker game lets you collect piggies with each click, and then use them to play exciting games or upgrade your piggy farm for even more rewards.

Start with a single piggy and watch your wealth grow as you click your way to prosperity. Use your piggies to do a coinflip, or try your luck at the slots. With every win, you'll earn even more piggies to keep the fun going.

Will you play it safe and save your piggies for future upgrades, or will you go all in for a chance at a big payout? The choice is yours in Piggy Payday.

Features:

- Easy and addictive clicker gameplay
- Play classic casino games like coinflip and slot machines
- Upgrade your piggy farm for even more rewards
- Compete with friends and other players for high scores
- Install Piggy Payday today and start clicking your way to piggy riches!
